product_name: La Sportiva Baruntse Mountaineering Boots - Men's
long_description: Ideal for harsh winter conditions on high-altitude peaks, the La Sportiva Baruntse Mountaineering boots feature an inner boot with lacing for a secure fit, and an insulated outer boot for warmth. Insulated, abrasion-resistant Cordura(R) nylon and synthetic microfiber uppers feature anti-abrasion polyurethane film for protection. Uppers feature high-density expanded polyethylene insulating netting and expanded polyethylene for warmth. Removable liner boots are constructed of 7mm thermo-formable high-density EVA foam and Cordura(R) nylon; liners feature a speed lacing system for a dialed fit. 6mm insoles feature an insulating fibrous material that offers superb insulation and a reflective aluminum facing for excellent thermal performance. Thermoplastic urethane midsoles feature honeycomb heel grids that flex upon impact for lightweight cushioning; nylon plates provide support when wearing crampons. High-rise sticky Vibram(R) rubber rands stand up to rock abrasion and crampon wear. La Sportiva Baruntse Mountaineering boots have durable Vibram Montagna rubber outsoles for amazing traction; boots are compatible with step-in crampons.
